constructionwand.description.core:
§5§nINSTALLATION§0§r
Put your new core together with your wand in a crafting grid to install it. To switch between cores, hold down %s and left click empty space with your wand or use the option screen.
constructionwand.description.core_angel: The angel core places a block on the opposite side of the block (or row of blocks) you are facing. Maximum distance depends on wand tier. Right click empty space to place a block in midair. To do that, you'll need to have the block you want to place in your offhand.
constructionwand.description.core_destru: The destruction core destroys blocks (no tile entities) on the side facing you. Maximum number of blocks depends on wand tier. Destroyed blocks disappear into the void, you can use the undo feature if you've made a mistake.
constructionwand.description.wand:
The %1$s can place up to %2$d blocks at the side of a building facing you and lasts %3$s.

Hold down %5$s and scroll to change placement restriction (Horizontal, Vertical, North/South, East/West, No lock).

Open the option screen with %6$s§9+Right click§0.

§5§nUNDO§0§r
Holding down §9Sneak+§0%4$s while looking at a blocks will show you the last blocks you placed with a green border around them. §9Sneak+§0%4$s§9+Right clicking§0 any of them will undo the operation, giving you all the items back. If you used the Destruction core, it will restore the blocks.

§5§nCONTAINERS§0§r
Shulker boxes, bundles and many containers from other mods can provide building blocks for the wand.

§5§nOFFHAND PRIORITY§0§r
Having blocks in your offhand will place them instead of the block you're looking at.
constructionwand.option.cores.constructi: Place behind blocks and in mid air
Destroys blocks on the side facing you
Extend your building on the side facing you
constructionwand.option.direction.target: Place blocks with same direction as target block
constructionwand.option.lock.eastwest.de: Build a row in E/W direction on top of the original block
Build a horizontal column in front of the original block
constructionwand.option.lock.nolock.desc: Extend from any side of the original block
Build a row in N/S direction on top of the original block
constructionwand.option.lock.vertical.de: Build a vertical column in front of the original block
constructionwand.option.match.exact.desc: Only extend blocks that are exactly the same
constructionwand.option.random.yes.desc: Place random blocks present in your hotbar
constructionwand.option.replace.yes.desc: Replace certain blocks like fluids, snow and tallgrass
constructionwand.tooltip.core_tip: Combine the core with your wand in a crafting grid
gui.constructionwand.require_opt_key_act: Require holding opt-key for wand actions
The wand actions in question are quick-switching cores and rotation lock.
gui.constructionwand.require_opt_key_men: Require holding opt-key for wand menu
The menu keybind will work regardless of this option!
gui.constructionwand.settings_text: Don't forget to check your keybinds!
